texts.es: Alejandro en meses pasados recibió un credikiva y compró frutas como mangos, peras, mandarinas, ciruelas, manzanas y uvas; con esta compra aumentó su inventario y trabajó mas holgadamente y con sus utilidades hizo algunas mejoras a su vivienda. En la actualidad sus ventas aumentaron y mejoró su calidad de vida. Él dice a sus financiadores: “Estoy muy agradecido, de que nos sigan apoyando para sacar adelante nuestros negocios. “ En la actualidad es tal su entusiasmo en su negocio que está aplicando un nuevo credikiva, con el cual comprará frutas importadas, y cervezas por cajas,  aprovechando la temporada carnavalera que se acerca,  para aumentar su capital de trabajo, vendiendo lo que mas le gusta a quienes la disfrutan y que es una de las fiestas mas representativas de la cultura caribe del mundo.
texts.en: Alejandro received a Kiva loan in the past few months and bought fruit such as mangos, pears, mandarins, plums and grapes.  With this purchase he increased his inventory and worked more comfortably, and with his earnings made some improvements to his home.  His sales are now increasing and he has improved his quality of life.  He says to his lenders: "I am very grateful to those who continue to provide support to grow our businesses." He is now so enthusiastic aout his business that he is applying for a new Kiva loan, with which he will buy imported fruit and cases of beer.  He plans to take advantage of the carnival season that is approaching, by increasing his inventory, and selling the thing he likes most to those who are enjoying the season, which is one of the best-known celebrations of Caribbean culture in the world..

loans.use: to buy imported fruit and cases of beer.

loans.name: St. Peters Group

texts.en:
Jane is a member of St. Peters Group in Kakamega South District.  She is pictured with 19 One Acre Fund farmers:18 women and 1 man.  Jane is standing on the right with her hand raised.  She is receiving an input loan for ½ acre of maize, millet, and sorghum cultivation. Jane first enrolled with One Acre Fund during the 2012 Long Rains, and is now preparing to be a One Acre Fund farmer during the 2013 Long Rains season.  Jane joined One Acre Fund in order to gain access to hybrid seeds and fertilizer and use the increased profits to send her children to school.

Jane reports that before One Acre Fund, she was able to grow about 1/2 bag of maize per ½ acre, but with her One Acre Fund input loan during Long Rains 2012, she harvested 8 bags per 1/2 acre! She plans to use the money that she earns from her next harvest to repair her home and save for the future. For the 2013 Long Rains season, Jane’s group members will take input loans of ½ acre each.  In total, this group will receive input loans for use on 91/2 acres of land.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize, millet, and sorghum.

loans.name: Panga Kilimo Group

texts.en:
David is pictured on the right with his hand raised amongst his Panga Kilimo Group members. The 10 of them, 7 women and 3 men, are farmers in Kakamega South District. Farming inputs will be delivered to him on credit consisting of the necessary materials to plant ½ acre of maize, millet, and sorghum. The 2013 Long Rains season will be David’s first season with One Acre Fund. He joined this year in order to grow enough food for the family and to be provided with enough farm inputs.

Last year, David harvested 5 bags of maize on 3 acres of land. He is excited to improve his harvest as a One Acre Fund farmer during the 2013 Long Rains season. He hopes that his profits from the 2013 Long Rains season can be used to send his children to school and repair his home. For the 2013 Long Rains season, David’s group members will take input loans of ½ acre each. In total, this group will receive input loans for use on 5 acres of land.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize, millet, and sorghum.

loans.name: Bidii Group

texts.en:
Bidii is a group of 13 farmers in Kakamega South District represented by Tom. The group has 7 women and 6 men.  Tom is on the right of the photo with his hand raised. Farming inputs will be delivered to him on credit consisting of the necessary materials to plant ½ acre of maize, millet, and sorghum. Tom first enrolled with One Acre Fund during the 2012 Long Rains and is now preparing to be a One Acre Fund farmer during the 2013 Long Rains season. Tom joined One Acre Fund in order to grow enough food for the family and use the increased profits to send his children to school.

Tom described his harvest as good last year, but believes he can have an even better one this year. He hopes that his profits from the 2013 Long Rains season can be used to send his children to school and for loan repayment. Bidii group members will each receive input loans of ½ acre during the 2013 Long Rains season.  In total they will receive inputs for 61/2 acres of maize and sorghum.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize, millet, and sorghum.

loans.name: Angelique

texts.en: Angelique is 33 years old. She is married and has three children. The oldest is ten and youngest is six. Her husband is her partner in business. She has been in business for three years.  She wants a loan to buy more food goods for her store. With the profit she will buy a house.

loans.use: to buy more food products to sell

loans.name: Hamisi

texts.en:
Hamisi is a resident of Mariakani, Kenya. He is a charcoal seller and has been doing this business for twelve years. Hamisi is married and the father of five children.

Hamisi is asking for a loan of 62,650 Kenya shillings to purchase new stock of charcoal to sell. He will pay for his children’s school fee from the extra income. 

Despite the challenge of high cost of transportation, Hamisi believes the business has a future and in addition to getting the income to educate his children, he looks forward to owning a vehicle (canter) to transport charcoal to other areas.

loans.use: to purchase new stock of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise like cooking fat, sugar, salt, flour etc., to sell

loans.name: Foresters Group

texts.en:
Stephen is pictured on the right with his hand raised among his Foresters Group members. The twenty-three of them, seventeen women and six men, are farmers in Kakamega South District. Farming inputs will be delivered to him on credit consisting of the necessary materials to plant ½ acre of maize, millet, and sorghum. Stephen first enrolled with One Acre Fund during the 2010 Long Rains season and is now preparing to be a One Acre Fund farmer during the 2013 Long Rains season. Stephen joined One Acre Fund in order to access the best input prices and gain access to hybrid seed and fertilizer on time.

Stephen reports that before One Acre Fund, he was able to grow about ½ bag of maize per one acre, but with his One Acre Fund input loan during Long Rains 2012, he harvested four bags per one acre! He plans on using future profits from the harvest to repair his home and send his children to school. During the 2013 Long Rains season, each group member will receive ½ an acre of agricultural inputs on credit. Stephen’s group will receive 11.5 acres worth of inputs on credit.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seed and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize, millet, and sorghum.

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es:
Maria, 62 años de edad, originaria de León, casada, madre de 4 hijos todos mayores de edad, ella  solo logro finalizar el sexto grado de primaria, de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la venta de  ropa, cosméticos y joyas de plata. Ella inicio  en el ámbito del comercio  a la edad de 52 años, vendiendo ropa usada de manera ambulante,  sale a vender a las comunidades mas cercanas de León, pero luego con las ganancias que le genero este negocio de venta de ropa decidió invertir en comprar ropa nueva como ropa interior para ambos sexo, camisas, faldas, cosméticos y joyas, ella se siente muy satisfecha porque que con mucho esfuerzo y arduo trabajo ha podido sacar adelante su negocio, sus expectativas es salir adelante y seguir vendiendo mas para llegar a ser un reconocida empresaria en el sector comercio. 
Ella  requiere el financiamiento para comprar mercadería tales como ropa, pantalones, blusas, faldas, vestidos, bóxer, calzones y a la misma vez poder comprar joyas de platas como anillo, pulsera y perfumes. Dentro de sus planes futuros es agregar nuevos productos de uso domésticos,  una de sus metas es poder cancelar el préstamo para luego volver a solicitar otro para seguir invirtiendo en su negocio.
texts.en: Maria is 62 years old and from Leon.  She is married and has 4 grown children.  She was only able to complete the sixth grade of primary school.  She works selling clothing, cosmetics and silver jewellery.  She started in the sales field at the age of 52, selling used clothing as a street vendor.  She travelled to the communities closest to Leon to sell.  Later she used her earnings from this business to buy new clothing such as underwear for both sexes, shirts, and skirts, cosmetics and jewellery.  She is very happy because with much effort and hard work she has been able to grow her business.  Her expectation is to continue growing and selling more, in order to become known as an entrepreneur in the sales field.  She needs the loan to buy merchandise such as clothing, pants, blouses, skirts, suits, boxers and underpants and also to buy silver jewellery such as rings and bracelets, and perfume.  Her future plans include adding new household products.  One of her goals is to pay back the loan so that she can request another in order to continue investing in her business.

loans.use: to buy clothing such as pants, blouses, skirts, suits, boxers, and underpants.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is a 40-year-old married man, father of four children. He has owned a convenience store for two years. He sells drinking water, fruits, vegetables and candies.

He is a man with a very good reputation in his field. Ali is applying for his second loan cycle from Kiva partner Al Majmoua, in order to increase his merchandise with a large amount of pure drinking water and canned food.

Through his previous loan he was able to build a storage room, where he stores all the additional products he sells to make good income.

He hopes to keep increasing his business capital to start wholesale trade in the future or open a supermarket.

loans.use: To increase his merchandise with a large amount of pure drinking water and canned food

loans.name: Mwazuma

texts.en:
Mwazuma lives in Mariakani area of Coast Province, Kenya. She is a poultry farmer. She started the business from the income she received from plant farming and financial assistance from her children.

She learned about Milango through friends who invited her to the group, and she joined with the aim of accessing credit to improve her business operations. Her main challenges are the high cost of transportation for feeds and animal diseases. 

Mwazuma is applying for a loan of 62,650 Kenya shillings to buy more chicks and poultry feeds. Her extra income from the loan will be used to purchase more feed stock. Her desire is also to keep hens for laying eggs in the near future.

loans.use: To buy more chicks and poultry feeds.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es: Luis  se dedica a inseminar el ganado de su establo para lograr mejores crías que  aumenten la producción de leche, también ofrece este servicio a los ganaderos locales, necesita comprar  un termo de inseminación artificial, por lo que solicita un millón cuarenta mil colones (¢1.040.000 ) con este dinero logrará desarrollar su proyecto de inseminación artificial y atender  a más ganaderos que  solicitan sus servicios en este campo, además de lograr mejores ganancias a partir de obtener ganado de mejor calidad.
texts.en: Luis works inseminating the cattle in his barn to breed better calves that will increase milk production. He also offers this service to local ranchers. He needs to buy a semen storage tank for artificial insemination, and for this reason he is requesting a loan of one million, forty thousand colons (¢1.040.000 ). With this money he will be able to develop his artificial insemination project and offer his services to more ranchers who are demanding it. He also needs to make more profits to be able to breed better quality cattle and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a semen storage tank  for artificial insemination of cattle.

loans.name: Esperanza Maribel

texts.es: Esperanza de 29 años de edad, habita junto a su esposo y sus hijos en casa propia. Es una mujer muy comprometida y responsable además entre sus cualidades están el ser trabajadora y honesta siempre con la visión que a su familia en especial sus hijos no les haga falta nada. Esperanza se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos es decir maíz y frijol vende cierta parte y la otra la deja para consumo propio es así como se gana la vida honradamente. La clienta desea incrementar un poco más sus cultivos y por eso ha decidido solicitar un préstamo a INTEGRAL para comprar insumos agrícolas como pesticidas, semillas, abonos, y fertilizantes y pagar una parte de alquiler de parcela. Ella tiene deseos muy grandes y por eso espera que la ayuda llegue lo más pronto posible y saldarla antes del tiempo previsto.
texts.en:
Esperanza, 29, lives with her husband and children in her own house.  She’s a very committed, responsible woman and among her qualities being a responsible, hardworking woman stands out.  She’s always focused on her family, especially her children, having everything they need.

Esperanza works growing basic grains, that is to say, corn and beans.  She sells part of it and keeps the rest for family consumption; this is how she earns an honest living.  

She wants to increase crop yields a bit which is why she’s decided to ask for an INTEGRAL loan to buy farm supplies like pesticide, seeds, manure and fertilizer as well as to pay part of the land lease.  She very big dreams and this is why she hopes help will arrive as quickly as possible and that she repays it ahead of time.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies and pay part of the land lease.

loans.name: Vicenta

texts.es: Vicenta de 29 años de edad, vive junto a sus tres hijos todos menores de edad quienes se dedican a estudiar y a ayudarle con el negocio.  Ella posee una tienda de productos varios y de primera necesidad para su hogar tales como: pan, leche, detergentes, jugos, huevos, como también golosinas. Ella ha tenido por dos años este negocio, lo que le ha permitido ser muy conocida en la zona y tener varios clientes que a diario consumen sus productos. Vicenta solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL con el deseo de mejorar su negocio surtiéndolo con nuevos productos y marcas de dulces, jugos, pan y otros más, así también para aumentar su inventario de lo que ya posee. Esto será muy positivo para Vicenta ya que mejorará sus ventas y podrá competir con otras tiendas que están en la misma zona. El mayor deseo de Vicenta es aumentar sus ventas, para brindarle una vida mejor a sus hijos y darles un hogar mejor.
texts.en: Vicenta is 29 years old. She lives with her three children, all of them minors. They go to school and help her with her business. She has a store with various basic necessity products for the home such as: bread, milk, detergent, juice, eggs, and snacks. She has had this business for two years. It has allowed her to become well known in the area and have different customers who consume her products daily. Vicenta is asking for a loan from INTEGRAL. With it, she hopes to improve her business, stocking it with new products and brands of candies, juice, bread and more. She also wants to stock up on what she already has. This will be very positive for Vicenta, since it will improve her sales and she will be able to compete with other stores that are in the same area. What Vicenta wants the most is to increase her sales and offer a better life to he children and give them a better home.

loans.use: to buy basic necessity products to improve her store.

loans.name: Nyuma

texts.en:
Nyuma lives in the Mariakani area of Coast Province, Kenya. He is a poultry farmer. The business has been running for ten years. He also sells charcoal. He learned about Milango through friends who invited him to the group. He joined with the goal of accessing credit to improve his business operations. His main challenge is the high cost of transportation and animal diseases.

Nyuma is applying for a loan of 21,100 KES to buy more chicks and poultry feed. His extra income from the loan will be added to his savings to purchase more stock and pay for transportation costs.

loans.use: To buy more chicks and poultry feed

loans.name: Sanifa

texts.ru: Санифа 1966 года рождения. Она с мужем и двумя детьми проживает в городе Душанбе. Санифа работает в сфере торговли более десяти лет. Она на одном из рынке города арендует магазин, где занимается продажей парфюмерии. Санифа целеустремленный человек. Она хочет увеличить товарооборот и расширить свой бизнес. Санифа берет кредит на сумму 3000 долларов для приобретения ассортимента товара (парфюмерии). За счет прибыли с продажи Санифа планирует купить магазин.
texts.en:
Sanifa was born in 1966. She lives with her husband and two children in Dushanbe. She's worked in sales for over 10 years. Sanifa rents a sales point on one of the city markets from which she sells perfumery products. 
Sanifa is a very driven person. She wants to increase her goods turnover and expand her business. She's asking for a loan in order to purchase perfumery products for resale. She plans to buy a store with the profits.

loans.use: to purchase perfumery products for resale.

loans.name: Hilda

texts.en:
Hilda is a resident of Mariakani, Kenya. She is a married mother of one child. She runs a clothes shop, which she has been operating for three years. 

She was introduced to Milango by her friends and joined them to get access to loans. She is applying for a loan of 21,050 Kenya Shillings to purchase new clothes to sell.

She believes the income from this loan will help her educate her child, and she is focused on owning a wholesale shop, despite the challenge of unpaid debts.

loans.use: To purchase new clothes to sell

loans.name: Trebol De Palcoco Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “TREBOL DE PALCOCO”  iniciará el segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Copacabana, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Rolanda es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: compra y venta de ganado, venta de comida, artesanías, tienda de barrio, tejido de mantas, forraje para animales.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Rolanda es integrante, ella indica que hace un año que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de un promotor de la institución que fue a visitarle a su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tienda de barrio; cuenta que este negocio lo emprendió al ver la necesidad que tenían ella y sus vecinos en su comunidad.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de arroz, azúcar, enlatados) que adquirirá de las ferias de la ciudad de El Alto, por mayor, y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de comercialización. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener a su familia, ya que ella es casada y tiene cuatro hijos.

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el ahorro.

En la fotografía no se encuentra la señora Carmen ya que se fue a la atención de su negocio.
texts.en:
The “TREBOL DE PALCOCO” communal association will begin its second cycle at Pro Mujer, as part of the Centro Focal de Copacabana. It is comprised of eight members and has a board of directors, of which Rolanda is the President. The businesses that the members of the communal association have are varied and include: buying and selling livestock, the sale of food, artisanal crafts, a neighborhood store, the weaving of blankets, and foraging for animals.

The loan they are taking out will benefit a group of small business owners, of which Rolanda is a member. She indicates that she joined Pro Mujer a year ago, joining in by invitation from a promoter of the institution who visited her in her home. She currently has a neighborhood store business; she says that she started this business upon seeing the need that she and her neighbors had in their community.
 
The loan she is taking out now is to increase capital (to buy rice, sugar and canned goods), which she will acquire wholesale at the markets in the city of El Alto and will subsequently sell in her store. This kind of work allows her to generate resources to maintain her family, as she is married and has four children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes saving money. Senora Carmen is not in the photograph because she was at her place of business.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar and canned goods.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy chickens to fatten.

loans.name: Leonardo

texts.es: Leonardo de 35 años de edad vive en el municipio de Soledad y se dedica a muchas de las operaciones de costura de ropa, tanto de manera individual como de todo el proceso de terminado, es decir,  él ofrece servicios de  diseño, corte, elaboración de ropa y de estampado, así como también compra  y vende vestidos elaborada por otras manos, en diversos  modelos que él no produce.  Su negocio inició desde hace 5 años, cuando trabajando en fábricas  de confecciones, aprendió este arte, con el cual se desempeña hoy de manera independiente, en un taller instalado en el domicilio donde habita; Leonardo desde el principio,   observó la confección como un negocio rentable que no requería de mucha inversión y con esa idea empezó su propia aventura de negocios.    En su proceso productivo ha implementado la compra de remates al por mayor y de contado, lo cual comercializa con una frecuencia diaria, durante 8 horas de trabaja, para responder a las necesidades de su clientela. Su meta de negocio es aumentar la producción y el volumen de sus comprar, para aumentar también el monto de sus utilidades. Su meta familiar es apoyar el estudio de sus dos hijas, en las edades de 14 y 15 años, para potencializar su éxito futuro. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará tela  en mayor volumen, pintura, y prendas de vestir,  en lugares donde el remate es una buena opción de aumentar sus ganancias y esto es justamente lo que garantiza el éxito de Kiva, acompañado de su experiencia y el buen servicio que ofrece en la comunidad donde sus vecinos lo reconocen.
texts.en:
Leonardo, 35, lives in the town of Soledad and does many sewing tasks, both individually and finishing touches.  In other words, he offers services in design, cutting, and making clothing and patterns.  He also buys and sells clothing made by others in a variety of styles that he doesn't make.  He started his business five years ago when he learned this art working in sewing factories.  Now he does it on his own in a workshop set up in his house.

From the beginning Leonardo saw sewing as a profitable business that didn't require a lot of investment.  He started his own business venture with this idea.  In his production process he has implemented buying close-out sales wholesale and in cash, which he sells on a daily basis.  He works for eight hours to respond to his customers' needs.

His business goal is to increase production and the volume of his purchases, to also increase the amount of his profits.  His family goal is to support the education of his two daughters, ages 14 and 15, to strengthen his future success.

Currently he's requesting a Kiva loan, his first financing from Fundación Mario Santo Dominogo, to buy fabric in bulk, paint, and garments from places where sale bargains are a good option for increasing his profit.

This is precisely what guarantees the success of Kiva, along with his experience and the good service he offers in his community where his neighbors know him.

loans.use: to buy fabric, paint, and garments

loans.name: Danilo

texts.es:
Danilo de 44 años de edad, originario de la Comarca la Concepción, localizado en las afueras de Teustepe, acompañado, padre de 4 hijos entre las edades de 13, 15,16 y 19 años, los cuales 2 de ellos están estudiando y los otros 2 trabajan en la siembra de maíz y frijoles, de oficio agricultor, se dedica a la siembra maíz y frijoles. Inicio su actividad agrícola desde muy joven ayudándoles a sus padres  en la siembra, el cual adquirió experiencia y total dominio propio del negocio, cuenta con el apoyo de sus hijos quien le ayudan a sembrar granos básicos, su cosecha la vende en la misma comunidad para evitar mayores  gastos, sus expectativas es seguir trabajando en su siembra para que le genere mayor producción en su cosecha. 
Danilo esta requiriendo el financiamiento para comprar mas tierras  y insumo como fertilizantes, abonos. Con el objetivo de obtener mejor producción en su cosecha, sus metas próximas es poder seguir trabajando en su siembra para poder cancelar este crédito para luego volver a solicitar otro y poder apoyar a su compañera  a establecer otro negocio.
texts.en:
Danilo, 44, is a native of the rural community La Concepción, located on the outskirts of Teustepe. He is married and the father of four children aged 13, 15, 16, and 19. Two of his children are attending school and the other two working in corn and bean farming. As a farmer, he grows corn and beans. He began this farming activity at a very young age, helping his parents on the farm. He acquired experience and complete knowledge about the business. He relies on the help of his children who help him to grow bulk grains. He sells his harvest in the same community to avoid further expenses. His expectations are to continue working in cultivation so that he can get a greater production from his harvest. 

Danilo is requesting this loan to buy more lands and supplies such as fertilizers and manures with the goal of increasing harvest production. His next goal is to continue working to be able to pay off this loan, and to then request another loan to be able to support his wife to establish another business.

loans.use: to buy more land and supplies such as fertilizers and manures.

loans.name: Ruben

texts.es: Ruben, tiene  29 años de edad, vive en una colonia que pertenece al municipio de Choloma Cortes, junto a su esposa y  su hijo.  Ruben tiene su propio negocio desde hace 3 años y medio. El vende productos lácteos como ser: queso, mantequilla y quesillo. Anteriormente trabajaba en una maquila pero decidió mejor por tener su propio negocio. La venta la realiza de manera ambulante, sale a vender en la comunidad y a sus alrededores. Ha decidido obtener un préstamo de 6,500 lempiras para surtir el negocio de productos lacteos.  El préstamo le ayudara a comprar de contado y poder ahorrar algo. Su meta es hacer crecer el negocio para ayudar a su familia y salir adelante.
texts.en:
Ruben, age 29, lives with his wife and child in a neighborhood in the Choloma Cortes municipality.  Ruben has had his own business for three and a half years.  He sells dairy products like cheese, butter, and ‘quesillo’ [similar to farmer’s cheese].

He used to work in a factory, but he decided it would be better to have his own business.  He sells in an itinerant manner.  He goes out to the community and surrounding areas to sell.

He has decided to get a loan for 6,500 lempiras in order to stock his business with dairy products.  The loan will help him to buy for cash and be able to save some.  His goal is to make his business grow in order to help his family and to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy dairy products like cheese, butter, and ‘quesillo’ [similar to farmer’s cheese].

loans.name: Grover

texts.es:
Grover es un joven de 29 años con abundantes deseos de superación, soltero y sin hijos. espera trabajar con entusiasmo y reunir las condiciones suficientes para a futuro formar una familia con todas las comodidades del caso. Actualmente reside en una vivienda construida a base material noble que le fue cedido por sus padres. Al cumplir la mayoría de edad logró ser propietario de una parcela heredada por sus padres y desde entonces viene desempeñando labores concernientes a la producción y mantenimiento de cacao orgánico.
Lleva casi 10 años en el rubro y comenta que le agrada mucho su trabajo puesto es una actividad que conoce desde pequeño en cuanto a las labores comúnmente desempeñadas como el deshierbo, y la fertilizción de  árboles de cacao. No obstante la temporada de lluvias dificulta su trabajo  por hallarse sus parcelas algo alejadas de su localidad.
Actualmente tiene en mente llevar a cabo el segundo deshierbo de maleza, que es muy indispensable para obtener una producción de calidad puesto que evita de esta manera que la mala hierba compita por los nutrientes con las plantaciones de cacao.
Sus planes a futuro como todo joven entusiasta es el de culminar la construcción de su vivienda con un segundo piso y posteriormente poner parte de ella en arriendo y generar ingresos paralelo a sus actividades en el campo. Tiene el agrado de lograr su primer crédito con MFP para el cual muestra su total compromiso en la puntualidad para el pago de su crédito.
Desea contar en esta primera oportunidad con 1,000 nuevos soles para contratar jornaleros y proceder con el segundo deshierbo de maleza.
texts.en:
Grover is a young man of 29 with a great deal of drive to succeed. He's single and has no children. He hopes to work enthusiastically and gather enough resources so that in the future he can start a family with all the comforts it requires. He currently lives in a house built with noble materials which was given to him by his parents. When he became an adult, he acquired ownership of a plot of land that was inherited by his parents. He has been working in growing and maintaining his organic cocoa crop ever since.
He has been in this line of work for nearly 10 years and he reports that he enjoys his work very much. It's a business he has been familiar with since he was young in terms of the most commonplace tasks such as weeding and fertilizing cocoa trees. Nevertheless, the rainy season makes his work difficult because his plot of land is somewhat distant from his village.
He currently intends to finish the second round of weeding, which is indispensable for obtaining a high quality produce. That way he'll keep the weed from competing for nutrients with his cocoa crop.
Like every enthusiastic young man, he has plans for the future. He wishes to finish the construction of a second floor in his house, then rent out part of it and get an additional source of income aside from his agricultural work. He is pleased to achieve his first loan with MFP, and he expresses his utter commitment towards repaying his loan in a timely fashion.
On this first occasion, he wishes to receive 1000 nuevos soles in order to hire day laborers and go ahead with the second round of weeding.

loans.use: to hire day laborers.

loans.name: Maria Reyna

texts.es: Maria Vive junto a su hijo en casa humilde pero propia. Es una buena mujer que su mayor ilusión ha sido entregarlo todo por su hijo y que él en un futuro agradezca su amor y sacrificio; es muy amable, honesta, y trabajadora. Tiene varias actividades, entre ellas se dedica a la venta de ganado y además posee un pequeño molino, es conocida por trabajadora por sus vecinos cercanos. Maria es una mujer con muchas capacidades las cuales la hacen ver como una gran mujer. Actualmente posee un pequeño terreno donde siembra insumos básicos y luego los dispone a la venta y desea vender un poco mas por eso que se acerco a INTEGRAL para solicitar un  crédito y así comprar insumos básicos como: semillas, fertilizantes, pesticidas, abonos entre otros. Espera que pronto su ayuda tenga respuesta y agradece a DIOS todo poderoso por la gran bendición que seguramente recibirá.
texts.en:
Maria lives with her children in a home that is humble but belongs to her.  She is a good woman and her greatest desire has been to provide everything for her children and that tomorrow they will thank her for her love and sacrifice.  She is very friendly, honest and hardworking which is what she likes to do most, and she is known by her close neighbors for being a hard worker.  

Thanks to God, Maria is a woman with many abilities which makes others see her as a great woman.  She has a small plot where she sows basic products which she then sells.  She would like to sell a bit more which is why she has come to INTEGRAL to request a loan to purchase basic products such as seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, etc.  She hopes to receive help soon and thanks God almighty for the great blessing that she will receive.

loans.use: to purchase basic supplies such as seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, etc.

loans.name: Yellow Group

texts.en:
Njiwa is a carpenter in his mid-twenties. He has been engaged in his trade for the past seven years, making and selling different kinds of furniture. He works from 7 a.m. to 6 p.m. daily and has been able to earn a good monthly profit. He supports one son who attends school.

This will be Njiwa's third loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used his previous loans to buy more carpentry wood, pay school fees, and support his household expenses. He has paid back both his previous loans successfully. 

Njiwa is now requesting a loan to increase his stock of wood. His dream is eventually to improve his business by purchasing electronic carpentry equipment.

He will share this loan with his loan group "Yellow," which consists of 11 members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase his stock of wood for his carpentry business

loans.name: St. Hellena Group

texts.en:
Rhodah’s group has 15 farmers, and it is located in Kakamega, South District. Rhodah is pictured on the right of St. Hellena Group with her hand raised. Rhodah is pictured amongst the 15 women of her group. She will receive input loans capable of planting on ½ an acre with sorghum, millet, and maize. Rhodah first enrolled with One Acre Fund during the 2012 Long Rains and is now preparing to be a One Acre Fund farmer during the 2013 Long Rains season. Rhodah joined One Acre Fund in order to gain access to hybrid seeds and fertilizer and grow enough food for the family.

Prior to joining One Acre Fund, Rhodah was only able to harvest 1/2 a bag of maize per ½ acre, but after joining One Acre Fund during the Long Rains 2012, she was able to harvest four bags per ½ acre! She plans on using future profits from the harvest to send her children to school and buy a cow. For the 2013 Long Rains season, Rhodah’s group members will take input loans of a ½ acre each. In total, this group will receive input loans for use on 7.5 acres of land.

loans.use: To purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize, millet, and sorghum

loans.name: Jericho Group

texts.en:
Jane is a member of Jericho Group in Kakamega South District. She is pictured with 10 One Acre Fund farmers, all of whom are women. Jane is standing on the right with her hand raised. 

Jane is receiving an input loan for half an acre of maize, millet, and sorghum cultivation. She joined One Acre Fund during the Long Rains 2012, and is now enrolling in the Long Rains 2013 season. Jane joined One Acre Fund so that she could gain access to hybrid seed and fertilizer. She was able to join because the package is paid in installments.

Jane reports that before One Acre Fund, she was able to grow about four bags of maize per half acre, but with her One Acre Fund input loan during Long Rains 2012, she harvested eight bags per half acre! She plans to use the money that she earns from her next harvest to send her children to school and to buy a cow. 

Jane’s group members will each receive input loans for a half acre during the 2013 Long Rains season. In total, they will receive inputs for five acres of maize, millet, and sorghum.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seed and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize, millet, and sorghum

loans.name: Liparit

texts.en:
Liparit is a farmer from Beniamin village in the region of Shirak. He lives with his wife and their three sons, a daughter-in-law, and two grandchildren. Together with his elder son, Liparit works hard to sustain the family.

His youngest son Haik studies at Mkhitar Heratsi Yerevan State Medical University, studying in the field of general medicine. Liparit does his best to sustain Haik's living in Yerevan, but unfortunately it is very difficult for him to pay his son's university tuition. 
 
For this reason, Liparit has applied for this loan to pay for his son's university tuition fees. The loan is very important for Liparit because it allows him to give his son an opportunity to complete his education.

His dream is for his son to become one of the best doctors in the region so that he can help the local people.

loans.use: to pay for his son's university tuition

loans.name: Ruth Maria

texts.es: Ruth Maria en su negocio de comidas rápidas, invirtió su credikiva anterior, compró un horno para pizzas, y mucha materia prima con la cual preparar todas las comidas rápidas que vendió en la época previa al  carnaval, donde le fue muy bien, porque se preparó para recibirlo con nuevos productos como las diversas picadas que ofrecerá. En la actualidad su clientela crece y para ello se prepara nuevamente por eso está aplicando aun nuevo credikiva con el cual comprará carnes frías, panes, papa, carne, pollo para aprovechar los 4 días mas movidos comercialmente, pues ya está muy cerca el  carnaval  de Barranquilla y con ello sus ventas se incrementan pues todos sus vecinos se dedican a esta fiesta, que  al son de los tambores y timbales, atrae muchos compradores y esto es muy bueno para Ruth Maria.
texts.en: Ruth Maria invested her previous Kiva loan in her fast food business. She bought a pizza oven and several supplies with which she prepared all of the fast food she sold during the pre-carnival season. It went very well, because she prepared herself for that with new products such as various types of dishes with ground beef. Her clientele is currently growing and therefore she's once again preparing for that. That's the reason why she's applying for a new Kiva loan. She'll use it to purchase cold cuts, bread, potatoes, meat and chicken in order to take advantage of her four busiest days. The carnival in Barranquilla is fast approaching and her sales increase from that, because all of her neighbors take part in these festivities. Several customers are attracted by the beat of the drums and kettledrums, and this is very good for Ruth Maria.

loans.use: to purchase cold cuts, bread, potatoes, meat and chicken.

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es:
Maria Magdalena es una mujer de 38 años de edad casada y de su matrimonio tiene cuatro hijos de los cuales tres de ellos estudian  y uno es especial (nació con hidrocefalia). La familia se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra y cultivo de café ubicada a 15 minutos de su vivienda a la cual se trasladan a pie diariamente. Sus hijos ayudan los fines de semana a sus padres en las actividades del campo y a diario con el cuidado con su hermano ya que ellos estudian; Maria Magdalena en su juventud no pudo estudiar por motivos económicos ya que sus padres son de bajos recursos económicos ella no tubo la oportunidad de cursar ningún año escolar por lo tanto se vio en la necesidad de luchar desde muy joven. Maria tiene una pequeña pulperia en su casa de habitación la cual le genera ingresos y ayuda con los gastos que a diario se presentan en el hogar como la vestimenta, las medicinas con muchas restricciones, alimentación, y la compra de algunos productos para la venta, pero con mucho esfuerzo atiende la pulperia y a su hijo mientras sus otros hijos regresan de la escuela y su esposo esta en el campo.  

Maria Magdalena hoy en día solicita ayuda para la limpieza, siembra y para darle mantenimiento a su cultivo ya que hoy en día existe una enfermedad (la roya) que afecta el café y perdió una parte de la siembra pero con el crédito ella podrá sembrar una variedad mas resistente. 

Su meta es que por medio de las ganancias que obtenga de la cosecha pueda cancelar su crédito y sean un respaldo para comprar los medicamentos que su hijo con hidrocefalia necesita; pero su sueño, es lograr ver a sus hijos graduados y con una profesión que les ayude a tener buenas oportunidades de empleo, un mejor estilo de vida y sean hombres y mujeres de provecho.
texts.en:
María Magdalena is a 38-year-old, married woman who has four children, three of whom are in school and one who is special (he was born with hydrocephalus).  Her family works in farming, planting and growing coffee 15 minutes from her house and transporting it on foot every day.  As they are in school, her children help their parents with the fieldwork on the weekends and they help care for their brother daily.  When she was a child, María Magdalena was not able to go to school for financial reasons, as her parents have few economic means.  Because she was not able to attend even a year of school, she had to work hard since she was very young.  María has a small grocery store in her house that generates income and helps with the expenses that come up at home every day, such as clothing, restrictive medications, food, and the purchase of products to sell.  However, she puts a lot of effort into tending her shop and caring for her son while her other children are at school and her husband is out in the fields.

María Magdalena is currently asking for help to clean, plant, and maintain their crop, as there is a disease (rust) that is going around that affects coffee plants and they lost part of their crop.  However, with the loan she will be able to plant a more resistant varietal.

Her goal is to pay off her loan with the earnings from her harvest and to have enough to buy the medications her son with hydrocephalus needs.  However, her dream is to see her children graduate and find professions that give them good employment opportunities and a better way of life and for them to be respectable men and women.

loans.use: to clean, plant, and maintain her coffee crop

loans.name: Kaliko

texts.en:
Kaliko is a farmer who grows grows sugarcane, cabbage, and bananas. He has also started a fish vending business in order to earn supplemental income to better support his family. He and his wife have five children, of whom three are attending school. They also have two grandchildren living with them. 
  
Kaliko is requesting a loan in the amount of 500,000 Uganda shillings in order to buy more fish as well as to increase his business capital. This will enable him to have good returns as well as to meet the market demand for fish. His future dream is to improve his business by acquiring a motorcycle to help him transport his wares to and from the market. 
 
Kaliko is grateful to his lenders, who will be helping him to expand and improve his business.

loans.use: to buy fish to offer for sale

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy, age 34, and her husband James are dairy farmers. They have been engaged in this business for the past five years. They have four children.

Lucy has applied for a loan from KADET Ltd in order to enable her to buy dry maize, sorghum, and millet to grind into flour, which she will offer for sale. She repaid her previous loan successfully and has seen her business improve as well. 

Her goal is to improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy dry maize, sorghum, and millet to grind into flour, which she will offer for sale

loans.name: Miguelina De Los Angeles

texts.es: Miguelina, 31 años de edad, habitante de la Comunidad Achuapa, en las afueras de León, acompañada, con conocimiento académico de  sexto grado de primaria, se dedica a criar cerdos. Inicio  en el ámbito del comercio hace un año, con capital propio,  comprando cerdos para engordarlos y luego venderlos a un buen precio para obtener mejores ganancias. Pero necesita tener sus animales en mejores condiciones, es por eso que hoy en día ella esta solicitando el crédito para comprar cerdos y cemolina (alimentos para los cerdos) vitaminas, desparasitantes y poder construir una galera para que sus cerdos tengan un lugar limpio en donde pueda desarrollarse sanos y fuertes, dentro de sus planes futuro es poder establecer una granja de cerdos para vender al  por mayor a sus clientes, ya que de esta manera podrá obtener mejores ingresos y lograr una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: 31-year-old Miguelina lives in the village of Comunidad Achuapa, in the outskirts of León. She's in a common law marriage and her level of education is the 6th grade of elementary school. She raises pigs. She got her start in the business a year ago by using her own capital. She bought pigs for fattening and then sold them at good prices so that she could improve her profits. However, she needs to keep her animals in better conditions, and that's why she's currently requesting a loan in order to purchase pigs, semolina (for feeding the pigs), vitamins and deworming medicine. She'll also be able to build a yard so that her pigs can have a clean space in order to grow strong and healthy. Among her plans for the future is to establish a pig farm so that she can sell to her customers by wholesale. That way she'll be able to obtain better profits and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase pigs, vitamins, deworming medication and feed concentrate for pigs.

loans.name: Odette

texts.en: Odette is 31 years old. She is married with two children. The oldest is four years old and the youngest is one month. Her husband works as a businessman. She has been in business for two years selling children's clothing. She wants a loan to buy more children's clothing to sell. She will use the profit to build her savings.

loans.use: To buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy vegetables and fruit wholesale, as well as bags of charcoal.

loans.name: Chugi Group

texts.en:
Chugi Group is located in Kakamega South District. It is a group of nine women and seven men led by Estone, who is pictured on the right with his hand raised. He is receiving an input loan for ½ acre of maize, millet, and sorghum cultivation. Estone is a new One Acre Fund farmer and is excited for the 2013 Long Rains season. He joined One Acre Fund in order to gain access to hybrid seeds and fertilizer and increase his yield.

Estone described his harvest last year as good, but hopes he can have an even better one as a One Acre Fund farmer. He hopes that his profits from the 2013 Long Rains season can be used to send his children to school and repair his home. Estone’s group members will each receive input loans of ½ acre during the 2013 Long Rains season. In total they will receive inputs for eight acres of maize, millet and sorghum.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seed and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize, millet and sorghum.

loans.name: Gongo La Mboto 1 Group

texts.en:
Khamisi, who is in his mid 30s, is married and lives with his wife and son (who goes to school). For three years, Khamisi has been managing his life by running a clothing business. He is a hardworking man and it shows. He works from 9am to 6pm daily and is able to make a very good profit per month.

This will be his second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  He used the previous loan to buy more stock of clothes and has paid back his loan successfully.  He requesting a loan to open another clothing business in another place so as to expand his sales. His dream is to one day be able to build a house.

He will share this loan with his loan group" Gongolamboto" which totals 17 members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to open another clothing business.

loans.name: Chin

texts.en:
Chin was born in 1983. She has a son and three daughters. They are students in primary school. The youngest child is still little. Her husband is a carpenter and earns about 10,000,000 VND per month. Chin is also a carpenter. Her income is about 8,000,000 VND. She has done this job for 10 years.  

She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2008. In the last cycle she borrowed 9,184,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 10,080,000 VND to buy wood for her carpentry workshop. She always wants to raise her children well.

loans.use: to buy wood for her carpentry workshop.

loans.name: Grupo Pasac Group

texts.es:
Don Domingo (a la mitad con playera de color corinto en la fotografía) un hombre de 42 años de edad el está en unión simple con su esposa y vive en Sololá. El tiene seis hijos de ellos dos mujeres y cuatro varones uno trabaja independiente y los demás trabajan en el campo de la agricultura y en los oficios del hogar.
 El se dedica al cultivo y al mantenimiento de la hoja de maxán (hoja que se utiliza en la cocina guatemalteca para empacar alimentos, ver fondo de la fotografía) la labor que le da a este cultivo es natural  utilizando fertilizante orgánico y prácticas que no atentan la naturaleza esto le da lugar a ser amigable con el medio ambiente.  Aprendió este trabajo junto a su padre porque es una de las actividades que más se realiza en la región.
De esta manara decide realizar su propio cultivo comprando primero una parcela a un kilometro de su vivienda de este modo el tiene  8 años de experiencia trabajando independientemente. El vende su producto en el mercado local  viendo  que su ganancia es buena y quiere seguir invirtiendo capital para ampliar su cultivo. El como  el representante de este grupo solicitando un préstamo para ampliar su cultivo comprando fertilizante orgánico, compra de plantillas para próxima siembra y el pago a trabajadores que preparan la parcela. El sueña que en un futuro pueda comprar otra parcela y seguir ampliando su cultivo y obtener más y mejores ganancias para la economía familiar. Los demás integrantes de este grupo se dedican a esta misma actividad cultivando y dándole el mantenimiento a la hoja de maxán que es una de las principales actividades de la región en la generación de trabajo.
texts.en:
Domingo (in the center of the photo with the maroon t-shirt), 42, is married and lives in Sololá. He has six children, two daughters and four sons. One works independently and the rest work in the fields and in the home. He works growing and maintaining maxan leaves (a leaf that is used in Guatemalan cooking to stuff foods - see the background of the photo). He grows this crop naturally, using organic fertilizer and practices that don't put nature at risk. In this way, he is kind to the environment.

He learned this skill alongside his father because it is one of the most common activities in the region. He decided to grow his own crop, first buying a plot of land one kilometer from his home. He has eight years of experience working independently. He sells his product in the local market, and because his income is good, he wants to keep investing money to expand his crop. As the representative of this group, he is applying for a loan to expand his crop, buy organic fertilizer, buy supplies for the next planting, and pay the workers who prepare the soil. His dream is to be able to buy another plot in the future and continue to expand his crop and earn more money for his household. The other members of the group work in the same activity, growing and maintaining maxan leaves. It is one of the main economic activities in the region.

loans.use: to maintain maxan leaves.

loans.name: Janett Del Socorro

texts.es:
Janett del Socorro de 48 años de edad, casada, con un hijo de 14 anos el cual está estudiando. Es originaria de la Paz Centro, lugar que está ubicado en el zona de occidente del país. La paz centro se caracteriza por sus comidas y bebidas típicas como el quesillo y el tiste. Janett ha demostrado ser una persona trabajadora, responsables, de buenas buena paga y lo ha demostrado en sus créditos anteriores.
Gracia a su ganas de salir adelante, brindarle mejores condiciones económicas a su hijo, es que tiene por actividad económica la compra y venta de cerdos, y destace del mismo para ofrecer sus productos como: nacatamales, chicharon, yuca, charrasca, adobado, frito blanco, chingaste, moronga. Desde hace 11 anos que se dedica a dicha actividad. Negocio que lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitación y de forma ambulante. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y compra un lote de cerdos en pie que lo vende a buen precio. Para que en un futuro no muy lejano obtener mejores ingresos. Janett del Socorro agradece la ayuda  que los inversionistas kiva les brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Janett del Socorro is forty-eight years old, is married, and has one son who is fourteen years old and is studying in school.  She is originally from la Paz Centro, an area that is located in the western part of the country.  La Paz Centro is known for its typical food and drink, like el quesillo (fresh cheese) and el tiste (drink made from cacao and corn).  Janett has demonstrated that she is a hardworking and responsible person who pays her installments; she has demonstrated this in her previous loans.  

Thanks to her drive to move forward and to offer the best economic conditions to her son, she makes a living in the buying and selling of pigs; she also butchers pigs to offer pork products like: nicaraguan tamales, pork rinds, pork-stuffed cassava, pork skin, pickled pork, fried pork, pork bits, and black pudding.  She has been dedicated to this business for eleven years.  Her business is located in the house where she lives, and she sells door-to-door.  

The purpose of her loan is to invest in working capital and in the purchase of a batch of live pigs that she can sell at a good price.  In doing this, she will be able to have better revenues in the near future.  

Janett del Socorro is thankful for the help that the Kiva investors have offered to people from scarce resources and poor countries, like Nicaragua, in order to have a means of dignified work.

loans.use: To buy and sell pigs as well as butchering to offer products such asnicaraguan tamales, pork rinds, pork-stuffed cassava, pork skin, pickled pork, fried pork, pork bits, and black pudding

loans.name: Sion Group

texts.es:
La señora Maria Elena  esta casada, tiene 39 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, no tuvo hijos, se dedica a la tejeduría de cortes típicos, inicio este negocio con poco capital y pocos materiales, hasta ahora lleva 8 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica al mismo trabajo de tejeduría de cortes. 

Organiza un grupo para poder solicitar un préstamo, que lo utilizara para la compra de materiales, para su negocio, específicamente la compra de labores de diferentes diseños e hilos, espera seguir prosperando su negocio y poder tener empleados mas adelante. Las demás integrantes se dedican al comercio, tejeduría y a la crianza de animales.
texts.en:
María Elena is married and is 39 years old.  She didn't have the opportunity to study and never had children.  

She makes her living weaving traditional skirts.  She started this business with little capital and few materials.  She now has 8 years of experience, and counts on the support of her husband, who also makes his living weaving traditional skirts.

She has organized a group to be able to apply for a loan, which she will use to buy materials for her business, specifically embroideries of various designs and threads. 

She hopes to continue prospering in her business and to be able to have employees in the future.  The rest of the members of the group make their living in selling, weaving and animal husbandry.

loans.use: to buy thread and decorative embroideries for weaving.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Es un hombre muy emprendedor que su mayor deseo es entregarle un mejor futuro a su familia queriendo tener nuevos horizontes y olvidarse de la delincuencia. Tiene un grupo familiar por el cual se esmera día a día, es muy trabajador, el se dedica al cultivo de maiz, tiene poco tiempo de en este trabajo y se siente orgulloso porque ha logrado que le dé buenos resultados, tiene mucha clientela  y el terreno que identifico como muy bueno para desarrollar sus actividades es bastante fértil; con éstos ingresos el brinda y nunca falta el pan de cada día a su familia. Su deseo es tener mejores beneficios para que el día de mañana lleve a su hogar lo que se necesita. El esta muy comprometido con sus objetivos y tiene la convicción de que si aumenta la siembra así aumentarán las ventas, es por eso que se acercó a solicitar un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maiz, abono, fertilizante etc.  Agradece la colaboración que recibirá y confía en Dios que nunca lo abandonará, para ya no verse influenciado por malas compañías y estar siempre ocupado en obras buenas como éstas y así velar de la mejor manera por su familia y ser ejemplo correcto para ellos.
texts.en:
He is an enterprising man whose major desire is to give his family a better future wanting them to have new horizons and to forget about the crime. He has a family unit for which struggles day by day. 

He is hardworking, dedicated to growing corn. He has been doing this work for a short time and is proud that he has managed to get good results. He has many customers and the land is picked out to give good results and it is sufficiently fertile to do his work. He is able to provide for his family and they never lack food.

His desire is to have better earnings so that tomorrow he takes home what is necessary. He is very committed to his objectives and he is convinced that if he plants more he will also sell more and this is why he asked for a loan to permit him to buy corn seed, manure, fertilizer, etc.

He is thankful for the assistance that he receives and trusts in God to never abandon him, and to never be influenced by bad company and to always be busy with good work such as these and thus watch over his family and to be a good example for them.

loans.use: to buy corn seed, manure and fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Hombre con éxitos y fracasos pero con la idea de mejorar su vida y la de su familia. El reside en un humilde hogar junto a su grupo familiar,  en una zona con alta violencia social del país, día a día debe lidiar con ella para no verse arrastrado y afectado por entorno; superarse es la razón de que él se esmere para ganarse un futuro mejor. Se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol desde hace poco  y sabe que con el tiempo obtendrá la experiencia necesaria para obtener buenas ganancias ya hay hecho de personas que lo buscan por la calidad de su producto y por el excelente servicio. Actualmente el tiene el deseo de impulsar aun mas su producción  y es por eso que humildemente se acerco a solicitar un crédito para comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, abono, etc. Esta seguro que con la ayuda recibida podrá brindarle un mejor futuro a su familia y también confía en Dios que pronto saldara la deuda adquirida. Agradece de ante mano el apoyo, cuenta con la satisfacción de que es muy capaz de realizar todo aquello que se proponga.
texts.en:
This is a man with success and failures but with the idea of improving his life and that of his family.  He resides in a humble home together with his nuclear family in an area of high violence of the country.  Day to day he has to fight so that he is not brought down or effected by the environment.  Improving himself is the goal so that he can obtain a better future. 

He recently works in the farming of corn and beans and he knows that with time he will gain the experience necessary to earn good profit. There are already people that search for him for the quality of his product and for the excellent service.  Currently he wishes to increase his production even further and for this reason that he decided to humbly apply for credit to purchase corn seeds, beans, fertilizer, and manure. 

He is sure that with the help that he receives that he will be able to provide a better future for his family. He also has faith in God that he will be able to quickly pay the acquired debt.  He thanks you in advance for the support. He has the satisfaction of knowing that he always accomplishes what comes before him.

loans.use: to purchase corn seeds, beans, fertilizers, and  manure

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Vive en una localidad con alta violencia social y espera cambiar esta realidad para su familia en un futuro cercano para que así ellos no sufran la influencia de la delincuencia, por ello se levanta cada día para brindarles lo mejor de ella, es muy conocida en la zona de residencia, por su humildad y su entrega al trabajo, nunca se ha dejado vencer y siempre ha salido adelante con sus dificultades pues es una mujer totalmente comprometida a sus metas. Con esfuerzo y dedicación posee una tienda en la que vende productos de primera necesidad, granos básicos, azúcar, jabones entre otros, es muy trabajadora y muy amable a la hora de vender es por eso que asegura que cada dia tendrá mas clientes que la prefieran por la calidad los buenos precios y sobre todo por el buen servicio. Se ha visto en la necesidad de surtir un poco mas la tienda y no tiene el capital para realizarlo, es por eso que se acercó a solicitar un crédito que le permita  comprar más productos como granos básicos, huevos, bebidas, golosinas, jabones, etc. Confía en Dios de que pronto la ayuda solicitada será brindada y no tendrá más preocupación que llevar el sustento diario a su hogar.
texts.en:
She lives in an area of high social violence and hopes to change this reality for her family in the near future so that they do not suffer the influence of crime, and this is why she gets up each day to give them her best. She is very well known in the neighborhood for her humility and dedication to work, never being overcome and she has always gotten through her difficulties as she is a woman totally committed to her goals.

With spirit and dedication she has a store where she sells staples, basic grains, sugar, soap, and other items. She is hardworking and very friendly when selling and this is why she has more customers every day as they prefer her for the quality and good prices and above all for her good service.

She has seen the necessity of a few more supplies for the store and she does not have the capital to do it and this is why she came to ask for a loan to permit her to buy more products such as basic grains, eggs, beverages, sweets, soap, etc. She has confidence in God that soon help will be provided and will not have to worry so much about meeting the household needs.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, eggs, beverages, sweets and soaps

loans.name: Ulises

texts.es: Ulises es agricultor con mucha experiencia,  labora en la siembra de maíz y frijol, mediante esta actividad obtiene ingresos que le permiten mantener a su familia, en la zona donde vive al sur del país se cultiva este producto y esta es la mejor época del año para cosecharlo, por lo cual Ulises solicita un préstamo de cuatrocientos mil colones (¢400.000)con el comprará semillas e insumos agrícolas para proteger su cultivo durante el desarrollo, manifiesta estar feliz de poder contar con crédito rápido y cómodo.
texts.en: Ulises is a farmer with a lot of experience working with corn and beans. He uses his income to take care of his family. In the south where he lives, this is the best time for harvesting his crop, which is why Ulises is requesting a loan of 400,000 CRC to purchase corn and bean seeds and agricultural supplies. He is happy to have access to quick and convenient credit.

loans.use: to purchase corn and bean seeds and agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Personas con deseo de superación hay muchas y una de ellas es esta mujer, ya que con esfuerzos ha logrado posicionarse y alcanzar lo que hasta hoy a logrado, es muy trabajadora, positiva y emprendedora. Vive junto a su pequeña familia que es su mayor ilusión, cada mañana se levanta con deseos de hacer lo necesario para convertirse en una mejor persona, siempre alejada de la influencia de la delincuencia que la rodea. Piensa que nunca es tarde para dar lo mejor de si y nunca ha decaído con sus ideas. Actualmente ella vende tamales exquisitos, elaborados con material de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además de ofrecer un buen servicio, como tiene poco tiempo con el negocio quiere seguir impulsándolo pero necesita comprar materia prima suficiente, asegura que asi aumentara la venta con la que  obtendrá los ingresos necesarios para la manutención futura de su familia, Es por eso que se  acercó a solicitar un crédito para así comprar  como maíz, gallina, verduras, etc. Por su forma de vender posee de clientes que la prefieren y cuenta desde ya con la ayuda de Dios que pronto podrá saldar la deuda que le aprueben y al mismo tiempo llevar a su hogar una vida plena.
texts.en:
There are many people with motivation to improve the quality of their life. One of them is this woman.  With personal effort she has been to position herself and accomplish up to today what she envisioned. She is very hard working, positive, and a self-starter. She lives with her small family who is her biggest inspiration. Every morning she wakes up with the desire to become a better person. She is always trying to distance herself from the delinquency that surrounds her. She thinks that it is never to late give the most and she has never declined her ideas. 

Currently she sells exquisite tamales created with high quality ingredients ,at accessible prices, and with excellent service. Although she has worked a short time at the business, she wants to expand the business but needs to buy sufficient basic materials.  She promises that this will increase her sales, which will generate the necessary income to support her family. 

For this reason she is requesting a loan to buy corn, chicken, vegetables, etc. Because she has established clientele and the help from God, she will be able to repay her debt. At the same time provide a better life for her home.

loans.use: to purchase corn, chicken, and vegetables

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El deseo de superarse es uno de los sueños mas importantes de una mujer que vive junto a su grupo familiar en casa propia en una zona de alta incidencia de violencia social y delincuencia, desea no verse afectada por ella, es una de las mejores decisiones que ha tomado y se siente orgullosa de eso, se dedica a la venta de comida, sopas, carnes, arroz, frijoles, bebidas entre otros, comercia desde un lugar que califico como bueno para sus actividades comerciales y poco a poco se ha hecho de clientela que la prefiere por la calidad del producto, por los precios accesibles y sobre todo por el servicio mas rápido, es una mujer activa, emprendedora, dedicada a su labor, y con muchas metas que desea lograr, esta trabajando duro por alcanzar un futuro mas prospero. Se siente muy contenta con el comedor pero sabe que necesita hacerlo crecer a fin de salir de la pobreza, en las últimas semanas aumento la venta, por lo que quiere realizar una mayor inversión en la compra de los insumos necesarios para realizar sus comidas, por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar carnes, verduras, granos básicos, bebidas, etc. Tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: The desire to overcome is one of the most important dreams of this woman, who lives together with her family in their own home in an area of frequent social violence and lawlessness. The choice not to see her self affected by this violence is one of the best decisions she has made and she feels proud of it. She works selling food, soups, meats, rice, beans and drinks, among others. She sells from a qualified location that is good for her commercial activities and little by little she has acquired customers who prefer her because of the quality of her product, her reasonable prices, and above all for her quick service. She is an active woman, an entrepreneur, who is dedicated to her work and with many goals that she desires to achieve. She is working hard to obtain a more prosperous future. She feels very content with the restaurant but she knows that she needs to make it grow in order to rise out of poverty. In the last few weeks she increased her sales so she wants to complete a large investment in the purchase of the supplies necessary to make her food. Because of this she is seeking a loan that will allow her to buy meat, vegetables, grains and drinks, etc. She has good payment references and is very responsible. She is sure that she will pay off the debt and at the same time is confident that it will bring economic security to her home.

loans.use: to purchase meats, vegetables, grains and drinks.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Siempre hay momentos duros y difíciles pero el deseo de superación siempre se nos presenta en la vida, Este joven es un claro ejemplo de ello; vive junto a su familia con la que tienen el mejor deseo de salir adelante y nunca dejarse vencer por las adversidades del diario vivir, aún rodeados de una fuerte violencia social de la que es victima la localidad en la que residen. Es un hombre muy trabajador y honesto y comprometido con sus objetivos, tiene muy buenas relaciones con las personas del lugar y eso le ayuda con su negocio, él se dedica a cultivar maíz y sorgo y tiene poco tiempo de trabajar en el rubro pero se esta haciendo de experiencia q le permitirá obtener siempre las mejores ganancias, quiere aumentar la producción pero lamentablemente no tiene el capital suficiente para esta inversión, es por eso que se acercó a solicitar un credito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, sorgo, fertilizante, herbicida etc. Agradece la ayuda que espera recibir, y  se compromete a saldar la deuda adquirida a la vez que espera darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
There are always hard and difficult moments, but it is the desire to overcome this is always present in our lives. This gentleman is a clear example of this. He lives along with his family and they all have the desire to get ahead and not allow the adversity of everyday life to overcome them. Even when they are surrounded by violence present in the local community where they reside. 

He is a very hardworking and honest man and he commits to his objectives. He has very good relationships with the people of his locality and that helps him in his business.  He works recently in the farming of corn and sorghum. Even though he has a short time at this work, he is gaining experience that will allow him to obtain better profit.  He wants to increase production, but unfortunately he does not have enough capital for such an investment. 

For this reason that he reach out for a loan to allow him to purchase corn seeds, sorghum, fertilizer, and pesticides, etc. He is grateful for the help that he hopes to receive and he commits to repay his debt and at the same time give his family a better life.

loans.use: to purchase corn seeds, sorghum, fertilizers, and pesticides

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Es un hombre muy emprendedor que su mayor deseo es entregarle un mejor futuro a su familia queriendo tener nuevos horizontes y olvidarse de la delincuencia., él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol y tiene poco tiempo de dedicarse a la agricultura pues esta teniendo un nuevo comienzo que le permitirá obtener muy buenas ganancias, se esta haciendo muy conocido por las personas de la localidad y hay personas que lo prefieren por la calidad del producto, los buenos precios y el servicio inigualable siempre a la orden del cliente; es un hombre comprometido, dedicado a su labor todos los días lucha por conseguir un futuro mejor alejado de la violencia social de la que es victima la localidad en que reside, día a día se esta esforzando al máximo pues esta feliz con su trabajo y no quiere decepcionar a su familia, en las ultimas semanas se decidió a aumentar la producción pero necesita realizar una nueva inversión por eso le solicita un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, herbicida, abono, etc. el joven tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, esta contento con la ayuda y asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda, y a la vez tiene fe que podrá llevar a su pequeño hogar seguridad económica para una vida plena.
texts.en:
This is a very enterprising man whose greatest desire is to give his family a better future; he wants to reach new horizons and put crime behind him. He works cultivating corn and beans. He has only been working in agriculture for a short time, as he is making a fresh start that will allow him to obtain a better income. 

He is becoming very well-known among the people in the area, and there are people who prefer him because of the quality of his product, his good prices, and his unbeatable service, always at the beck and call of his customers.

He is a committed man who is dedicated to his work. Every day, he fights to attain a better future, removed from the societal violence to which the area where he lives has fallen victim. Day after day, he is putting out his maximum effort, because he is happy with his work and he doesn’t want to disappoint his family. 

In recent weeks, he decided to increase his production, but he needs to make a new investment. Therefore, he is requesting a loan that will allow him to buy seeds for corn, beans, weed-killer, fertilizer, etc.

This young man has good payment references and is very responsible. He is glad for the assistance and assures that he will be able to pay off the debt. At the same time, he has faith that he will be able to bring economic security to his small home for a full life.

loans.use: to purchase seeds for corn, beans, weed-killer, and fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El deseo de superarse es uno de los sueños mas importantes de un joven que vive junto a su grupo familiar, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol y tiene poco tiempo de dedicarse a la agricultura pues esta teniendo un nuevo comienzo que le permitirá obtener muy buenas ganancias, se esta haciendo muy conocido por las personas de la localidad y hay personas que ya lo prefieren por la calidad del producto, los buenos precios y el servicio excelente; es un hombre emprendedor, dedicado a su labor todos los días lucha por conseguir un futuro mejor con nuevos horizontes y alejado de la violencia social de la que es victima la localidad en que reside, día a día se esta esforzando al máximo pues esta feliz con su trabajo y no quiere decepcionar a su familia, en las ultimas semanas se decidió a aumentar la producción pero necesita realizar una nueva inversión por eso le solicita un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, herbicida, abono, herramienta, etc. el joven tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda, y a la vez tiene la esperanza que podrá llevar a su pequeño hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: The desire to better oneself is one of the most important dreams of a young man that lives with his family unit.  This young man works cultivating corn and beans.  He has been working in agriculture for only a short time as he has a new beginning that will allow him to obtain very good earnings.  He is becoming well-known by the people of the town and there are people that already prefer him for the quality of his product, the good prices and the excellent service.  He is an enterprising man and dedicated to his work.  Every day he struggles to attain a better future with new horizons and away from the social violence to which the town where he lives is a victim.  Every day he is striving to the maximum as he is happy with his work and he doesn’t want to disappoint his family.  In the last few weeks he decided to increase production but he needs to make a new investment.  For this reason he is requesting a loan that will allow him to buy corn and bean seed, herbicide, fertilizer, tools, etc.  The young man has good payment references and is very responsible.  He maintains that he will be able to pay off his debt and at the same time he has the hope that he can bring economic security to his small household.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seed, herbicide, fertilizer and tools.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy shoes in bulk.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El entusiasmo de superarse es uno de los sueños mas importantes de una joven mujer de veinticinco años de edad que vive junto a su grupo familiar, ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad granos básicos, leche, huevos, entre otros, ya tiene algún tiempo con el negocio y sabe que eso le regalara valiosa experiencia en las ventas que le permita obtener las mejores ganancias, la tienda se ha hecho muy conocida por las personas de la localidad y ya tiene clientela que la prefiere por la calidad del producto, los buenos precios y el servicio excelente; es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor todos los días lucha por conseguir un futuro mejor con nuevos horizontes y alejada de la violencia social de la que es victima la localidad en que reside, día a día se esta esforzando al máximo pues esta feliz con su trabajo y no quiere decepcionar a su familia que es lo mas importante para ella, todo este arduo trabajo quiere verlo reflejado en su hogar pues su casa ha tenido algunos deterioros y quiere repararla para la seguridad de todos por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar cemento, ladrillos, duralita, etc. La joven tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda, y a la vez tiene fe que podrá llevar a su pequeño hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: The desire to succeed is one of this young woman's greatest dreams. She is 25 years old and lives with her close family. She owns a store where she sell basic goods such as bulk grains, milk, eggs and so on. She has been running the business for a while and she knows that this will give her valuable experience in sales to obtain the best profits. The store has made her well-known by people in the local area and she already has a customer base who go to her for the quality of her product, the good prices and the excellent customer services. She is a very enterprising woman, dedicated to her everyday goal of fighting for a better future with new horizons far from the social violence she is a victim of in the area in which she lives. She is doing her very best every day as she is happy with the business and she doesn't want to let down her family which is of utmost importance to her. All of this arduous work she hopes to see reflected in her home as her house has a bit of damage and she wants to prepare it for the safety of all.
